title: Select
description: Allows users to choose one option from a dropdown menu

frontMatter.title: Select
frontMatter.description: Allows users to choose one option from a dropdown menu

accessibility.value: Component includes `aria-invalid` support for error states
Screen reader support for labels, hints, and error messages

frontMatter.code_usage:
<!-- Basic select -->
<va-select
  label="Branch of service"
  name="branch"
  required
>
  <option value="">- Select -</option>
  <option value="army">Army</option>
  <option value="navy">Navy</option>
  <option value="airforce">Air Force</option>
  <option value="marines">Marine Corps</option>
  <option value="coastguard">Coast Guard</option>
</va-select>

<!-- With hint text -->
<va-select
  label="Preferred contact time"
  name="contactTime"
  hint="We'll try to call during this time"
>
  <option value="">- Select -</option>
  <option value="morning">Morning (8am - 12pm)</option>
  <option value="afternoon">Afternoon (12pm - 5pm)</option>
  <option value="evening">Evening (5pm - 8pm)</option>
</va-select>
